actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the nonrecognition of gain on sales and exchanges of capital assets when the proceeds are reinvested in securities issued by domestic corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the nonrecognition of gain on sales and exchanges of capital assets if the proceeds are reinvested in securities issued by domestic corporations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the nonrecognition of gain on sales and exchanges of capital assets when the proceeds are reinvested in securities issued by domestic corporations.
